articles.title: Meteor that hit Earth in 2014 was from another star system, scientists say - Daily Mail
articles.description: In a newly-released memo, US Space Command officials have said that a rocky body that lit up the skies near Manus Island, Papua New Guinea in 2014 'was indeed an interstellar object'.
articles.content:
Experts have confirmed a meteor that hit Earth in January 2014 did come from another solar system and is therefore the first known interstellar object.

articles.title: Solar storm: Blackout risk as NASA warns of 'direct hit' on Earth – impact time predicted - Express
articles.description: A SOLAR STORM heading straight for a 'direct hit' with Earth on April 14 is expected to intensify, which could cause chaos to satellites and spark power grid fluctuations.
